name: Pur3v4d3r Video Transcript

properties.name: aliases
properties.value: {{"Generate 2-3 aliases: the video title, a shortened version, and the creator's name + topic format (e.g., 'Tiago Forte on PARA'). Comma-separated."|split:", "}}

properties.name: tags
properties.value:
{{"Select 6-10 tags. Return comma-separated:

TYPE: type/video, type/tutorial, type/guide, type/course
STATUS: status/not-watched, status/seedling
PLATFORM: youtube, course-content, lecture
DOMAIN (pick 2-3): cognitive-science, learning-theory, pkm, productivity, prompt-engineering, self-improvement, obsidian
TOPICS (based on content)"|split:", "}}

properties.name: type
properties.value: {{"Classify: tutorial, lecture, course, reference, guide, analysis. One word."}}

properties.name: link-up
properties.value: {{"Select MOC based on video topic. Return ONLY wiki-link:\n[[cognitive-science-moc]], [[learning-theory-moc]], [[pkb-&-pkm-moc]], [[prompt-engineering-moc]], [[practical-philosophy-moc]], [[artificial-intelligence-moc]]"}}
